name: WheelAndGrabs
description:
Controls/Tips :

- WASD or Arrows to move the player around

- Space to jump

- Move against a wall while jumping to wallrun

- Press Ctrl to start/quit climbing

- The climbing is still work-in-progress, so if the climbing pose gets stuck, double-tapping Ctrl often solves it.

- Press E to lock the climbing pose and move the player ball.

- Press E while climbing the vehicle's red block to drive it.

- Press RMB or M to switch on/off the Mouse Menu

- Press P to pause/unpause the game

- Press R to restart the scene

- Alt+F4 to quit
